Name: Lollo Campaign Finale
Description: You have a new "Lollo Take-in" order. Please fulfill it in time.
QuestDesc: You have a new "Lollo Take-in" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A stunning idea.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will name it "Lollo Take-in". I was inspired by a post on Lollo's internal forum.

Options.PlotLineKey: Take-in? Are you trying to say takeout food?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, I'll show you. Read this article!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "A non-native customer placed a Lollo cold-chain order, wanting a Pulled Chicken from Panhua's Restaurant..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "But I only found that I forgot to take the food when I arrived at the customer's location. Careless of me..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "To make up for my slip, I rode the customer to Panhua's Restaurant, so he could order the chicken himself and have a fresh taste!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, I contacted this courier and got his authorization...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The traditional food delivery takes the food to the customer's home. In that case, it might be difficult to balance time-efficiency and the condition of the dish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And that's why our "Lollo Take-in" will go the other way: we deliver our customers to the food!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I already came up with a slogan: Eat wherever you want with Lollo Take-in!

Options.PlotLineKey: Something feels off, but I can't name it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have a new take-in order. Please pick up the customer on time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An order! That looks like a faraway location, though... I don't think I've ever seen any people living there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay. Call me if everything turns out fine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I'll drive there to pick up the customer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A few days have passed. Today, the Incubator project's final decisions will be revealed. You meet Maji at the Lollo Logistics Station.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They didn't accept any of my project proposals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm not made for the manager position, so I applied for transfer. I'll go back to working as a courier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No way, you bought that? I'm just going on a trip.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While they didn't accept any of my proposals, the board said I had some great ideas, and that they would like me involved in some other pipelines.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm leaving for Lollo's headquarters. Looks like it is farewells for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who knows? You may become a customer of one of the new services I come up with one day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So long, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm exhausted...

Options.PlotLineKey: ...But at least everything worked out in the end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those Exiles finally woke up and decided to return home.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, what about my business? I say, my product matrix formed a closed loop and successfully educated the Exiles to become our customers. This turned out a promising growth curve!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, enough with the fancy words... Ahem. I hereby declared that "Maji's Lollo Entrepreneur Pilot Business Projects" will end today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Be sure to redeem your rewards with Lollo Stamps in time. Don't say I didn't remind you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tomorrow's not a payday, but feel free to swing by for a casual chat anytime.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Better yet, if you can bring me some new potential clients...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, and I have put together the "Entrepreneur Pilot Business Report."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've listed you as a co-author. Did I spell your name right, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Recipient... "Lollo Entrepreneur Incubator Supervisory Board", and... send. Done.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for the help, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry I came late.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile A
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are we getting beaten for nothing for the second time?

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile B
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We called it quits right after we made the apology... Sob sob...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We were going in town for the last meal together before turning ourselves in to the Patrollers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, you were the ones who...

Options.PlotLineKey: Turns out they're the ones who called "Lollo Take-in."

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile A
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah. Boss promised to treat us to a big meal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile B
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that you brought about that case of "Lollo Hitman", we apologized and made reparations. Why do we have to be beaten again today?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Interestingly enough, I picked up a Patroller who lost the way while I drove here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll make it 100% sure: was it true that you were going to have the last meal before turning in?

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I swear I'm not lying. It's all worth it for a feast at Panhua's Restaurant.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now move. Get on the truck.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Traveling towards Jinzhou in a Lollo courier truck, a mix of strangers—a logistics manager, Exiles, a lost Patroller, and yourself—converge at Panhua's Restaurant. Around the table, unfamiliar faces bond over a feast of exquisite dishes, their spirits lifted by the shared joy of good food.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile A
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bad news, boss! Ain't that the Lollo Hitman?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile B
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dang, no way! Who the heck called Lollo Hitman?

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But, but we already apologized! Hmph, we won't be beaten for the same matter twice. Let's kick {Male=his;Female=her} arse!
